00047 #if defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00048 #   include <pthread.h>
00049 #   include <limits.h>
00050 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00051 #   define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00052 #   include <windows.h>
00053 #else
00054 #   error Unsupported platform.
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00058 extern "C" {
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 
00062     /* Minimal available slots that are for sure usable on the platform. */
00063 #if defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00064 #   define AMP_RAW_THREAD_LOCAL_SLOT_COUNT_AVAILABLE_FOR_SURE PTHREAD_KEYS_MAX
00065 /* #   define AMP_RAW_THREAD_LOCAL_SLOT_COUNT_POSSIBLY_AVAILABLE_MAX PTHREADS_KEY_MAX */
00066 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00067 #   define AMP_RAW_THREAD_LOCAL_SLOT_COUNT_AVAILABLE_FOR_SURE TLS_MINIMUM_AVAILABLE
00068 /* #   define AMP_RAW_THREAD_LOCAL_SLOT_COUNT_POSSIBLY_AVAILABLE_MAX 1088 */
00069 #else
00070 #   error Unsupported platform.
00071 #endif    
00072     
00073     struct amp_raw_thread_local_slot_key_s {
00074 #if defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00075         pthread_key_t key;
00076 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00077         DWORD tls_index;
00078 #else
00079 #   error Unsupported platform.
00080 #endif
00081     };
